markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Electric Eelskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=152)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 557 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Shining, slippery eelskin covers the plates of this +_1 resilient [greater slick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=289) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4) _. The armor gives you the ability to breathe water and grants you a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to Swim and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks you attempt in the water.

<document level="2" id="action-108" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _shocking grasp_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Electric Eelskin
